items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape’s Ultra Hold gives our most reliable, longest lasting liquid adhesive hold.">
items.storedetaileddescription: A fan favorite, Walker Tape’s Ultra Hold liquid adhesive gives hair system wearers one of the longest, strongest, and most consistent adhesive bonds. A maximum wear (4+ weeks) adhesive, Ultra Hold is gentle on skin, easy to clean, waterproof, and dries clear for a shine-free wear.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use. 

     

Storage

   

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely. With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Prep for Install

  1. Before bonding, prepare skin with 99% Alcohol to clean of any dirt, oils, or residue.
  2. Apply Max Hold Sport to the scalp to help boost the bond and protect the scalp from irritation.

 

Directions

  1. Apply two thin layers of adhesive to the skin or base, making sure the first is dry before applying the second.
  2. Blow dry or let sit until the adhesive is very tacky.
  3. Next, press the hair system onto the skin and hold firmly for 10 seconds
  4. Do not swim, workout, or shampoo for at least 24 hours.
items.pagetitle: Ultra Hold - 3.4 fl oz, Brush-On | Walker Tape
